page.title: 13The Blacksmith
page.content: Michael Roberts is an{artistic {Blacksmith,}he has been living in the Miserden area since he was six.He did his training abroad in Switzerland and Germany for four years.He has been working in the area since 1964.The modern Blacksmith has been accepted in Britain.He starts work between 8:30a.m and 9:00a.m and he finishes at 7:00p.m with half an hour for lunch.Four nights a week he works from{8:00 p.m to{midnight}and he works six days a week. Working conditions have changed since he started in a Nissen hut. The tools are better than the ones he had when he began. He has over{123 different hammers.Three quarters of the work goes to private clients,the rest is sold from his showroom.It takes 7 years to learn the job.{He is {one of only 25 expert blacksmiths.
